course.subject: HUMA
course.name: Study of the Modern Chinese Writing System
course.description: This course will present a critical study of the modern Chinese writing system, including its origin, simplification, Romanization (Latinization), acquisition, recognition, and adaptability to various Chinese dialects and other languages. Theories and research in general linguistics, sociolinguistics, heritage history and cognitive science will also be covered in order to address adequately issues related to Chinese characters.
